Exceptional. At least as good as the original Half-Life, and in some regards better. You can play this for the first time now with no nostalgia value, and still walk away regarding it as one of the best shooters of all time.

Can't go wrong with a classic. It shows its age by now, but the action is great and the characters and facial expressions are still so unique and technically impressive. I'd forgotten how long this game was, even for a couple sessions. 22 hours is an epic for a story-driven FPS as far as I'm concerned, but I'm grateful that the following episodes were many times shorter and no less exciting. Half-Life 2 is a hallmark for FPS games and a masterpiece for Valve, improving on the original in every way. But likewise, the fan-originated Black Mesa came a long way in improving on both games, and now we finally have a stunning follow-up with Half-Life: Alyx in VR, so there is a bright future for the bleak world we've journeyed through since 1999. Cheers.

One of the best game of all time. I used to play this game on my Xbox 360 and i was just amazed. The game was just amazing, the game was very 100 iq, the game was very epic and overall i was having fun playing the crazy game, and the bearded guy from the game. The game is good and sometimes fun but its gets annoying since people will disagree the game with their stupid facts (lol i dont remember the people) and the game requires a lot of playing so you can see the game and more game like this. Luckily the game provides you with good time. The game is a lot of fun to discuss with friends. 8.5/10

I kind of get why it was so popular back in the day, but you really cant say that its a masterpiece in todays standards.

Welcome. Welcome to City 17. You have chosen, or been chosen, to relocate to one of our finest remaining urban centers. I thought so much of City 17 that I elected to establish my administration here, in the Citadel so thoughtfully provided by our Benefactors.
